meanings.definition: To bet or gamble on a series of events or outcomes.
meanings.sent1: He parlays his luck by betting on horse races.
meanings.sent2: She always parlays her money on sports games.
meanings.sent3: The cat parlays its chances by playing with a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The student parlays their knowledge into winning the trivia contest.
meanings.sent5: The entrepreneur parlays their investment into a successful business.

meanings.definition: To use or develop something to achieve a desired result.
meanings.sent1: She parlays her creativity into beautiful artwork.
meanings.sent2: He parlays his skills into a successful career.
meanings.sent3: The chef parlays their ingredients into a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The team parlays their hard work into a championship win.
meanings.sent5: The scientist parlays their research into groundbreaking discoveries.
